meanings.definition: A condition in which the heart beats with an irregular or abnormal rhythm.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with arrhythmia after noticing the irregular heartbeat.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother's arrhythmia requires her to take medication to regulate her heart rhythm.
meanings.sent3: During the dance party, the arrhythmia of the music made it impossible to follow the beat.
meanings.sent4: The arrhythmia of the city's traffic mirrored the chaotic nature of its streets.
meanings.sent5: The arrhythmia of the drumming echoed through the concert hall, captivating the audience.
